description: ***You must be a Consensus attendee to attend. Consensus badge required for entry.*** Immerse yourself into the legendary energy of Happy Wednesday at Happy Valley Racecourse! With Consensus as an Official Cup Race Sponsor, all badge holders are granted special access to prime viewing areas. Place your bets on thrilling horse races, dance to live music, and party with a pint in the lively Beer Garden. This iconic Hong Kong experience is as fun as it gets. Consensus Attendees have exclusive rights to the Beer Garden stands as you enter the race course. Entrance Use Gate G, Beer Garden Entrance.
